titles.title: A bill to extend the effective period of a production incentive certificate.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2554)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/9/1993--Introduced. Deems a certain production incentive certificate reissued on November 1, 1993, in the amount of its balance remaining on such date. Extends it through October 31, 1994.
